subject: BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Flavia Pennetta routed Agnieszka Radwanska, 6-2, 6-1, in the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif., for the biggest title of her career.
snippet: Flavia Pennetta routed Agnieszka Radwanska, 6-2, 6-1, in the BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif., for the biggest title of her career.
